comments: Specialist in orchids of Bolivia (see C.A. Luer in Ic. Pleurothallid XX (Monogr. Syst. Bot. Missouri Bot. Gard., 79): 29 (2000).
examples: Lobivia aguilarii R.Vásquez in Kakt. And. Sukk., 25(1): 1 (1974); Catasetum  fuchsii Dodson  & R.Vásquez in Ic.Pl.Trop. (Orch. Bolivia) Fasc. 6 t.513  (1982).
source: Letter from A. Hansen c. 1984 (date as '1942'). Correction of year of birth (1941) from author.  Full name in Monogr. Syst. Bot. Missouri Bot. Gard. 103: 37 (2005).
